about_the_game:
Schrödinger's Bar. Cozy and atmospheric, easily the most frequented bar in town. You meet Jona, who is waiting for his best friend Louise. It's the 25th of December, one day after Christmas Eve. The air is brimming with emotions everywhere... yuck. Emotions. Jona wishes he wouldn't have any for Louise. But this night is supposed to be the night he finally confesses his feelings! If only everything would go smoothly....
Hints of a plot emerge and Jona & Louise get caught in a sticky web of darkly spun threads. What at first seems obvious turns out to be carefully planned, and silence leads to false leads. All these mysteries are confusing as hell! Especially when you also have some to hide yourself.


Key Features
- Various puzzles
- Minigames where you do not expect it
- Lovingly designed characters
- Multiple playable characters
- Hand drawn graphics
- Self-developed language
- Effortful frame-by-frame animation

content_descriptors.notes: The game shows the consumption of alcohol, alcohol abuse and its consequences.

detailed_description:
Schrödinger's Bar. Cozy and atmospheric, easily the most frequented bar in town. You meet Jona, who is waiting for his best friend Louise. It's the 25th of December, one day after Christmas Eve. The air is brimming with emotions everywhere... yuck. Emotions. Jona wishes he wouldn't have any for Louise. But this night is supposed to be the night he finally confesses his feelings! If only everything would go smoothly....
Hints of a plot emerge and Jona & Louise get caught in a sticky web of darkly spun threads. What at first seems obvious turns out to be carefully planned, and silence leads to false leads. All these mysteries are confusing as hell! Especially when you also have some to hide yourself.


Key Features
- Various puzzles
- Minigames where you do not expect it
- Lovingly designed characters
- Multiple playable characters
- Hand drawn graphics
- Self-developed language
- Effortful frame-by-frame animation

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6300U CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please be aware that this game is designed with 16:9 in mind.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 Series, Geforce 130 Series with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit
  • Additional Notes: Please be aware that this game is designed with 16:9 in mind.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel 2.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6970 Series, Geforce 640M GT or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit

name: TotalNerds Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6300U CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please be aware that this game is designed with 16:9 in mind.

short_description: You play Jona & Louise in a city where everyone seems to have something to hide. People have secrets and a plot has been hatched. Who can you trust? Better to trust no one, not even technology.
